text: Lukáš Rosol was the defending champion, but withdrew because he was still playing in Indian Wells this year. Aljaž Bedene won the title, defeating Tim Smyczek in the final, 7–6(7–3), 3–6, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Irving Tennis Classic - Singles
title: 2015 Irving Tennis Classic – Singles
